name: Legal Services For Entrepreneurs
description: Legal Services for Entrepreneurs (LSE) provides free legal services to low-income individuals who want to start or develop businesses; businesses committed to investing in economically distressed communities, including hiring people with arrest and conviction records; and mom and pop shops located in areas where gentrification is a force for displacement. We provide free legal consultations on: - Entity formation - Terms of a commercial leas - Business contracts - Employment law - Intellectual p

We provide free legal consultations on: - Entity formation - Terms of a commercial leas - Business contracts - Employment law - Intellectual p
whatTheyOffer: Legal Services for Entrepreneurs (LSE) provides free legal services to low-income individuals who want to start or develop businesses; businesses committed to investing in economically distressed communities, including hiring people with arrest and conviction records; and mom and pop shops located in areas where gentrification is a force for displacement. We provide free legal consultations on: - Entity formation - Terms of a commercial leas - Business contracts - Employment law - Intellectual p
howToGetIt: Once the application form is submitted, LCCRSF staff will contact you to schedule a 30-minute call to listen to your situation, confirm your eligibility for our free legal services, and match you with the right attorney and resources.
address: 131 Steuart Street, Suite 400, San Francisco, CA, 94105
agency: Lawyers' Committee for Civil Rights of the San Francisco Bay Area
